text:
Chris has been involved in IT and technology since the mid-80s. His strong interest in computers and science led him to an education in electrical engineering and telecommunications at Tekniska Vuxengymnasiet in his native Gothenburg. In addition to the technical and mathematical subjects he studied programming in Assembler, Comal and took a course in CAD/CAM – mechanical engineering.

He has a background in mathematics from the University of Gothenburg and Chalmers University of Technology.
During his time at CTH he served as the treasurer of the F-section’s study committee and a board member on the school of Engineering Physics and Physics as well as a board member on the school of Mathematics and Computer Science at the University of Gothenburg and Chalmers University of Technology.
He was employed by BT (British Telecom) as technical support analyst for a period in 1995-96.

In the early 2000s, he managed the website maverick-web.com where he provided programming in Perl, Javascript, html and css.

In the late 2000s, he ran and constructed the website www.igp.ph in the Philippines for the company Itensity Glow Products.

He recently completed a course in JavaScripts Development at EC Utbildning AB and he runs his own website www.chrisjohannesson.com.
